text: Michael Joseph Stack III (born June 5, 1963) is an American attorney and former politician. He was the 33rd lieutenant governor of Pennsylvania from 2015 to 2019. He is a member of the Democratic Party. He was a member of the Pennsylvania State Senate for the 5th district from 2001 to 2015. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Lieutenant Governors of Pennsylvania Category:Politicians from Philadelphia Category:Lawyers from Philadelphia Category:Politicians from Washington, D.C. title: Mike Stack
